channel.title: Dotnet on Automaly
channel.description: Recent content in Dotnet on Automaly

item.title: Framework vs. Platform
item.author: luan52@outlook.com (Max Nguyen)
item.description: Clear explanation of the key differences between software frameworks and platforms with practical examples. Understand when to use frameworks vs platforms in development architecture decisions.

item.title: Consuming Dynamics 365 Finance and Operations OData services from .NET
item.author: luan52@outlook.com (Max Nguyen)
item.description: Complete guide for consuming D365 Finance and Operations OData services from .NET applications including authentication, service principal setup, and C# implementation.
